name: Go
description: Get, build, test a go application, or run a custom go command.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: command
inputs.label: Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: The go command to run. Select 'Custom' to use a command not listed here.

inputs.name: customCommand
inputs.label: Custom command
inputs.helpMarkDown: The command to pass to go for execution.

inputs.name: arguments
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Arguments to the selected command. For example, build time arguments for go build command. The arguments depend on the command selected.

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Current working directory where the script is run. Empty is the root of the repo (build) or artifacts (release), which is $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)
